Privacy Policy

How we may share your personal information We may disclose your personal data to the following categories of recipients for our business purposes:
Vyopta may collect from and share personal information with companies who provide services such as information processing, extending credit, fulfilling customer orders, delivering products to you, managing and enhancing customer data, providing customer service, assessing your interest in our products and services, and conducting customer research or satisfaction surveys.
We may disclose your personal data to the following categories of recipients for our business purposes: to an actual or potential acquirer (and its agents and advisers) in connection with any actual or proposed purchase, merger or acquisition of any part of our business, provided however that we will inform the buyer that it must use your personal information only for the purposes disclosed in this Privacy Policy; and
